channel.title: Fun on Lyon's Field Notes

item.title: A load of balls
item.description: I’d like to learn to draw. So I’ve bought Kister’s You Can Draw in 30 Days: The Fun, Easy Way to Learn to Draw in One Month or Less. In it, he asks you to draw a plane, a house, and a bagel before you start the course. Here they are. These are all drawn on an iPad Pro, using an Apple Pencil and Procreate. They are rubbish. Initial Test
